welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hindley, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its rich history, beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this lovely city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal with modern facilities and a wide range of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
